description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              -	Management and maintenance of network and computers in company.
              
              -	Solve problems related to hardware, software and support user.
              
              -	Set up the LAN, WAN, familiar with Network equipment Router, Switch.
              
              -	Progaming.
              
              -	Take other tasks in network, computer hardware, and software based on the company’s needs.
              
              -	Other relative tasks of IT Section.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              -	Male or Female from 25 ~ 33 years old.
              
              -	Graduated Universities specialized in IT or computer science.
              
              -	Minimum 3 years experiences in programing system
              
              -	Fluently in English.
              
              -	Having knowledge of programing & CCNA certificate is priority.
              
              -	Having a good knowledge of computer hardware.
              
              -	Hard working, self- motivated, wish to work at the company for long time.
              
              ========================
              

              * CV includes:
              
              1. Cover letter (English)
              
              2. CV (English - describe clearly education history and working experiences, outstanding achievements in study and job).
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
phuc-loi:
Các Phúc Lợi Dành Cho Bạn
             








                Attractive salary, capability will be appreciated according to working results.
               







                Opportunities to learn about Japanese working and management styles
               







                The company buses are provided to pickup staffs
